website_summaries.verdict: A fair pick for users who don't need a lot of bells and whistles, but some of its competitors have more to offer for a similar price.
pros: Stable build and crisp image quality in a mid-priced model
cons: Sound could be stronger, and volume could be louder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DVD player
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased multiple DVD players throughout the years, and the SYNAGY is by far the best of the lot. With exceptional picture and sound, easy-to-understand instructions, and an easy to use remote this DVD player is recommended for anyone who wants or needs one. It is, in fact, more reliable than the DVD program for my laptop. The seller was quick and the product arrived promptly, and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I've had mine for about a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I've had mine for about a year now & it still performs well. It is beginning to make some noises at times but that may be due to the daily use it's been through. I will purchase another one when the noise becomes too intrusive. Great color quality & excellent sound quality for a small unit.
customer_reviews.author: Old Groupy

customer_reviews.title: The screen is large and images are very good
customer_reviews.text: This DVD is excellent and is the cheapest I found here, is light, easily portable. Great image and very decent sound. The device arrived one day before I was waiting and works very well and I like being able to turn the screen for ease of viewing. It's also very light! I made a test in the car and works very well, Now I need the Headrest Mount Holder to install in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old Dogs Can Learn New Tricks!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this portable unit. I bought this for my husband who can no longer read books due to his eyesight. He does books on CD and was very happy with the sound quality and user friendly controls. I hope to borrow it on occasion for watching my DVDs when on vacation. Technology is fast moving making it difficult for us old timers to adjust, but this machine has made that transformation very easy and gives us confidence to learn all the other features it has to offer. The unit arrived on time and with much care from their shipping department. Everything was well protected and arrived in perfect condition. We are very happy and impressed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: We loved it so much that I purchased this second one ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd one purchased. I purchased the first one for my granddaughter that lives with me. We often drive to another state to visit my other granddaughter. We loved it so much that I purchased this second one for my out of state granddaughter for Christmas. They haven't used it yet but am sure they will get lots of use as well. Its great because once you figure out the remote controls you can start the player while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Kiefferf

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had the player for 2 weeks now and it has been great. We got it to replace one that our son had gotten a few years ago. The bigger screen is nice and unlike other reviews I don't have any issue with the sound, we use it in the car so I don't like it blaring in my ear. I like that I can easy move it from the car to the house. I haven't used it off a charger longer enough to know how well the battery lasts because I always keep it plugged in to the car charger. I would say it is a great player for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Alysha Cooley MA

customer_reviews.title: Brought this for a long drive with my kids good size and the volume is loud
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for a long drive with my kids good size and the volume is loud . This DVD portables is better than my old one who is 11.5 and louder and bigger which is crazy because this one is 10.1
customer_reviews.author: Erika vv

customer_reviews.title: Great Player. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this DVD and CD Player. It's plays wonderful, the stereo sound is amazing playing movie's is super clear. The player it's self is very well made. The player it's self is beautiful. The screen is nice and large . Would but again if need be. But this machine will last for ever. You way deserve the five stars. Thank You. Sincerely, Meese.
customer_reviews.author: MEESE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect use to have a movie night with your dog!
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the first purchase the seller was very nice and gave me a new one. It's very easy to watch you can even watch it on the bed I watch them near me while I'm all cuddle up wrapping around my blanket along with my dog. I think my dog even like watching it more than me! The noise are very quiet, it can't disturb anybody next to you. My dog and I have many movie date nights I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: AndiEve

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great DVD player! The screen swivels around so you can see it from any angle. The screen can pop off too, if needed. It comes with a remote so we can adjust it from the front seat while my son watches it in the backseat. The quality is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Robinson

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player is great! The quality is amazing. The picture is very good. The volume is excellent. Years ago I had purchased a DVD player (not from Amazon), and the volume was very tinny sounding. Not with this one! Definitely would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Georgianna Pattelena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. I had my brother help me in getting it installed. It wasn't as hard as we thought because we weren't going to be using it in my car. Therefore there were more pieces of equipment that we didn't need to use. I used it this afternoon for two hours and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Andra

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the device seems very good, not flimsy like some players I've had in ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the device seems very good, not flimsy like some players I've had in the past (this is my third player so far). I was disappointed that it will not play Flash drives formatted in NTFS format. Remote buttons are difficult to see in dim light, a lighted keypad would be a big improvement. Overall, a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: MurSmith

customer_reviews.title: surly got my moneys worth
customer_reviews.text: great dvd player easy to use buttons on it / also having a remote / and has the memory function for resume playing after turning off / win the battery goes low comes up on the screen to let you know
customer_reviews.author: Theodore V.

customer_reviews.title: Having never purchased an item like this before I was quite unsure of the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Having never purchased an item like this before I was quite unsure of the quality and reliability. We purchased two and both worked amazingly well on a recent trip. They were very user friendly, had great sound and amazing playback of our dvd's. I would definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Great value, battery worked with headphones over 5 hours, very sharp screen and good power alternatives included.
customer_reviews.author: William Hurwitz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Best little player ever. Easy to use. Great sound and amazing video! Small enough to take with you or set up in your home. Love every feature and highly recommend this amazing player.
customer_reviews.author: GFD

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I really love this DVD. It is sturdy, a good size and picture is very clear. I was worried to order from a 3rd party but SYNAGY was fine. Delivery right on time. Just note that this DVD does not come with earphones so I will look for some that are compatible. I would definitely recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Christine McDermott

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have usually bought 9" screens in the past - i have to say the 1 inch difference is significant! Also i generally don't keep expectations high on things like portable DVD players - they seem to get overused and over beaten up etc - but this model feels super- sturdy and i really like everything about it, highly recommend (so far!).
customer_reviews.author: katytexas

customer_reviews.title: so easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: exceeded all my expectations! so easy to set up and use. light weight, has a rechargeable battery, car adapter, and power cord. Remote immediately worked after pulling battery protection paper. Can be used with or without remote.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: He opened it and loved it. It is exactly what he needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubs for Valentine's, but he saw it and asked me to give it to him as an early gift. He opened it and loved it. It is exactly what he needed to wstch his DVDs! He is happy and I am happy that he's happy. Great product and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Just the thing.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific little thing that works perfectly for the yoga and Pilates DVDs I want to play. It's not truly a cinematic experience, but the sound and picture are great, and the color white makes it chic.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: affordable and easy to operate = win
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player is exactly what I was hoping for - easy to use out of the box and it simply does what it's supposed to do - lets me enjoy watching my DVD's. Very satisfied, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morris

customer_reviews.title: but it is a very good product so far
customer_reviews.text: My husband is going through chemo treatments and we bought this for his six hour sessions. He has only used it once, but it is a very good product so far!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DMoore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive the SYNAGY Car Headrest Mount Holder, also didn't receive the AV cable .I bought it to use in buy new 2018 jeep Cherokee and it has a load buzzing sound when hooked up in the jeep .BUT NOT IN THE HOUSE. SAD SAD SAD.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stiltner

customer_reviews.title: Works well from what we can tell
customer_reviews.text: My kids pooled their money to buy this portable DVD player for long car trips. It was received on time and as expected. They watched one movie on it to try it out, and then it was packed away until needed for our first summer car trip. I hope it continues to work well as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an excellent little DVD player!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, portable DVD player -- clear crisp image and excellent little speakers. Super pleased with this purchase. It's a fantastic value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent DVD Player / Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product and just as important, with the Customer Service. I contacted Synagy via EM regarding inability to play Region 2 UK dvds—I received a return EM within 30minutes with clear, precise instructions that immediately solved issue. I bought this player specifically to watch multi region media while recovering post surgery and it met all expectation. Good size, sharpness, color, sound and simple operation. Thrilled to finally be able to watch all episodes of UK series “Silent Witness”!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: goodwife74

customer_reviews.title: ... needed a way to view DVD's and this is wonderful. Has all cables to make it versatile and ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to view DVD's and this is wonderful. Has all cables to make it versatile and solved our problems. Arrived quickly, well packed and we are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MJEW

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: What a great player. It's just what I wanted for working out in my spare room. I use dvds and I don't have a tv there. I can move it around to where I need it or not. Easy to use too !!!
customer_reviews.author: Aupapillon

customer_reviews.title: she told me that she loves it and that she is very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: It arrived early and complete, I tested the product and it worked perfectly. Bought it as a gift for my mother, she told me that she loves it and that she is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Nunez

customer_reviews.title: great dvd player
customer_reviews.text: works very well. easy to use. nice clear on/off light and on/off button. holds a charge well. screen is clear. the built in speakers are good but i prefer the panasonic ear buds (inexpensive) which plug in nicely to this dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: flowernoire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This player is awesome. In addition to the capabilities of the player itself, it comes with household power cord AND a vehicle power cord. Also included are a remote control with battery and an RCA cable for connecting to TV, computer, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Cajun

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic especially for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic especially for the low price. My son loves it and I love being able to have a remote to it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hoff

customer_reviews.title: I have a number of portable DVD players in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of portable DVD players in the past and unfortunately all of them last only a few years. However while I have not had the SYNAGY A30 very long already it is easier to use, the controls are precise, and most importantly it makes very little mechanical noise when playing a DVD. Especially enjoying the 10.1 inch screen. So far so go!!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick DeLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: it worked like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this DVD player for our 3 year old son when we drove to Northern California from Southern Calif. it worked like a dream. We also used it in the house right before he went to bed a couple of nights while we were out there. Works Great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Ricard

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little unit. I had never heard of Synagy, so i compared it to a number of brands that i know and trust. The reviews that jumped out at me were the ones written by parents about their kids using the product...dropped a number of time and it still plays! I watch my DVD’s with this unit sitting in my lap. It doesn’t need to be flat to work and if i drop it i don’t panic! It’s sturdy. I wish it played BluRay and i wish the volume could be louder, but those are my only complaints. I like this player and i use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Appy

customer_reviews.title: I love this dvd player!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dvd player. I use it mainly to play yoga and exercise disks. It is very convenient as I can move it around easily and it is very light weight. The sound is very good and the picture clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Works well and is not expensive. Battery.charge lasts quite a while. Good picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Love it, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, the battery lasts very long and withstands the abuse my 2y/o puts it through, would buy again, definitely better than paying over $100 at Walmart or Target.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas bartek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my wife and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: jack caraveo

customer_reviews.title: A Great Find
customer_reviews.text: The portable DVD player is exactly what I wanted. Will sit in your lap, and the directions are easy to follow. I received it packaged well and in a time manner.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E. Delzell

customer_reviews.title: Wow this thing is even better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is even better than I thought! My 1 year old loves it to watch her sign language DVDs and we can take it to the doctor (cord-free!) to keep her entertained while we wait! Love the bright red color, too!
customer_reviews.author: mrs.sara.heckert

customer_reviews.title: Love the size of the screen
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the screen. It's user friendly. My only ctitique, the letters are too small and the color of the letters makes them almost impossible to read. So I have to use extra lighting to find control keys like the volume key. Otherwise we enjoy this portable DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Cowans

customer_reviews.title: You can turn screen so it folds and looks just like a reader
customer_reviews.text: Used for a trip and could not believe how long the battery worked!! You can turn screen so it folds and looks just like a reader. Great sound and picture! Delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Wapsisandy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice portable DVD player. My chrome book doesn't have a DVD drive so I went with this for when I'm traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Marlie

customer_reviews.title: Only good for widescreen videos
customer_reviews.text: This dvd player is only good if you want to watch dvds that are 16:9 ratio (widescreen). If you have the older type dvds that are 4:3 ratio, they will appear stretched. There are settings to change it, but they simply don't work. Even on the 4:3 settings, the videos still play widescreen and are stretched. For widescreen videos, it is a good quality player. This player is the same as the DB Power video player also sold on amazon. They both have the same problem, and appear to be made by the same manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will do the JOB I purchased it for
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will do the JOB I purchased it for. Main poiint. On the other hand I DON"T like to do surveys!
customer_reviews.author: jazpersn

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice big screen . My daughter has dropped it countless times and it's still working amazing ! Great value !
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for me!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I bought the recommended headrest holder. I love the remote because I can control it from the front seat of the car. Picture and sound are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low sound quality - earphones only.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use headphones, this works well. Otherwise, the audio on it is way too low for a group to enjoy. It will work on long car trips for one kid.
customer_reviews.author: Bicky Boops

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Thought it came with straps or something ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Thought it came with straps or something to attach to seat, but other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Greer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I like the DVD player a lot
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the DVD player a lot. The others I tried were very loud (the motor) but this is quiet. I like it very much. I like that it was shipped quickly and it works very well. I haven’t used it but once so far, but it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Confusing but worked great!
customer_reviews.text: The player itself works great. We are driving from MD to south TX so we purchased 2 of them since they can be wired together to play the same movie or play different movies to help with the arguing over who's watching what for our 3 boys. We had to buy an additional cord to connect them since the cords we received didn't connect them & was very short. It was kind of confusing getting them to play the same movies, but once we figured it out it was fine. Other than the cords streaming from one seat to the other, it was great. The players worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Adams

customer_reviews.title: The DVD player ha some great qualities such as charging the battery while watching the ...
customer_reviews.text: The portable DVD player arrived promptly and we charged the battery . Now we are slowly introducing it to the 93 year old that we bought it for. The DVD player ha some great qualities such as charging the battery while watching the screen at the same time and great screen resolution . The volume is loud enough for us younger folks to hear but we will be buying a head phone for our senior who will be using it .The ability to have a port for the head phone was very important to us when purchasing a portable player.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mantzaris

customer_reviews.title: I got it for my wife because she gets bored on her job
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my wife because she gets bored on her job, a lot of down time. She enjoys it so I enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: dgizzle

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. It arrived on time with no damage. It works great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Buzyrd

customer_reviews.title: versital to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to be used in house plug and also car jack.. the sound is clear and menu easy to use ... can rewind and fast forward of movie.. I am using it to watch bible study videos .. it is super so far.. I can use headphones and the sound it great... battery life last for hours.. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT to anyone looking for a DVD player... I am a 70 year old and am learning about technology. this is all new to me and was very easy to use...
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Oates

customer_reviews.title: good picture, volume acceptable though could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable price, good picture, volume acceptable though could be improved. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MGR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this DVD player for a month now and while we only use it every once it a while for longer drives in the car, it has held up well. It seems to be made well, and I love that the screen swivels and folds down to make it flat and capable of easily mounting in the car. The only downside I've found is that the lid for the DVD is a flimsy plastic and seems like it could easily break if you're not careful with it. Otherwise, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Wolter Family

customer_reviews.title: I am going to return it and get a better quality player
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October, 2016....it is February 6th, 2017 and it has stopped working....only used maybe 10 times.....cannot get it to come on...have charged battery...I am going to return it and get a better quality player...... it is a cute little machine....but it does not last long...only one adult has used it...no children.....I really wanted it to work! I am handicapped and listen to music to help  make it through the pain some days.....thought I was getting a good machine for the price...... Patricia Taylor
customer_reviews.author: Taylorsx7

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed with battery life, does not resume.
customer_reviews.text: I am used to desk top CD/DVD players that will resume from the last point played when turned on after being turned off. This one does not do that. It may be because of the portable nature. My wife has an older one (different brand) that does not have that feature either. You just have to remember where you were on the disc. It seems to go through batteries quicker than I would have anticipated. I haven't used it enough to rate the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value, keep my granddaughter happy for 13 hour car ride, priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: lynne champion

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is far better than I had expected
customer_reviews.text: This unit meets all of my expectations for a portable DVD player. The picture quality is far better than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: triciaj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as described. High quality. Delivered on date expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tomzwife

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Great picture Small enough to be taken ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use Great picture Small enough to be taken anywhere but not too small to clearly see picture.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mae Reames

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old and she loves it. Excellent quality! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: We were very impressed with the quality of this player, considering how little it cost. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: The battery has held up real good.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her dvd player. We use it on little trip and it keeps her entertained. The battery has held up real good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my mom and she really like it because it's really simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Juan pablo lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but misleading use
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other reviews I was able to find out that the USB formats they say work, do not. I fought with it for awhile till I read another review saying it only works with vob files. So I have to convert All my videos and movies to vob which is a pain but it at least works now. It does work on 32gb flash drive but it has to be in fat32 format. The screen is great and it doesn't skip. Only other annoying thing is the remote sensor is in a weird place when In the case they send for it.
customer_reviews.author: Katastic

customer_reviews.title: This DVD player worked great for about a month and now it skips no ...
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player worked great for about a month and now it skips no matter what DVD I put in it. I have it mounted upright on the headrest, it seems to work fine when it’s flat in your lap. I use it for my young child to watch and she is not able to hold it. It’s disappointing since I’ve only had it for 2 months. Can’t figure out how to contact customer service. Would love to exchange for a new one and give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great player just what I wanted, have already used it a lot and it plays much longer than expected
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA ENGEBRETSEN

customer_reviews.title: Will use this at My Airborne Reunion in June, ...
customer_reviews.text: Will use this at My Airborne Reunion in June, and My Aco/506 Reunion in July to play my Vietnam movie from 1968 I made off my browny 8mm.
customer_reviews.author: patrick j berry

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic little DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little DVD player. I didn't realize when I purchased it has a rechargeable battery. I can take it anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: SRitenour

customer_reviews.title: Very good DVD Player from my experience so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. I checked it out to make sure everything worked. Very good DVD Player from my experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: John Mentzer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter than my laptops. Only (2) hours battery strength for dvd`s though.
customer_reviews.author: JamesFleener

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Needed a good DVD player for an upcoming plane ride. We purchased a smaller one for our 4 year old and wanted a slightly bigger one for our 7 year old and this is perfect. We tried it out yesterday on a road trip. I love how it turns into tablet style!
customer_reviews.author: D3Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: We recently took this DVD player with us on our Christmas trip to visit our granddaughters. It worked great! There was time to watch two DVD’s during the flight. The picture was crisp, the color very nice. The battery lasted the six hours needed, and my earphone were no trouble to plug in. I would recommend this to anyone that wants to watch DVD’s during air or car travel
customer_reviews.author: Hope❤️

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, plays well
customer_reviews.text: Able to use it straight out of the box with very little setup. Slim and compact. Good picture and sound. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little portable DVD player. The picture and sound quality are fine. It is attractive. And it works well. The buttons on the machine itself are a bit stiff, but the remote is good. I use it for yoga, and put it on a stationary hard surface. The swivel screen gives me plenty of flexibility. I cannot speak for its durability as I have not had it long enough. Customer service is good.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Last a Year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. Within a year, the auxiliary out option makes an awful buzzing sound through the entire system. We’ve tried 3 different auxiliary cords, and it’s the DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Strooney

customer_reviews.title: SYNAGY 10.1 INCH SCREEN
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS EASY TO USE & SETUP DVD PLAYER! GREAT PICTURE, GREAT SOUND WITH EAR BUDS OR HEADPHONE. I ALSO PURCHASED ANOTHER ONE 5 DAYS LATER. DOES THE JOB FOR ME!!
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS  DILGER

customer_reviews.title: I like the convinience of buying black friday prices online and not in the crazy croudy store
customer_reviews.text: I like the convinience of buying black friday prices online and not in the crazy croudy store. I needed to upgrade the dvd player since the one we use now is almost 10 years old. technology changed a lot since this is much lighter gadget and has superb visuals. I am glad I waited close to black Friday as prices pleased me too. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mster

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this dvd player. Only downfall it doesnt have a battery life indicator so they only way I know when the battery needs to be charged is it will just shut off mid movie 👎🏻 other than that it's a great dvd player
customer_reviews.author: Kay Free

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use...fits the needs I purchased it for. Really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch portable DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy using DVD player on trips and bus rides. Good battery life and quality of picture is great. Recommend for long road trips. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Leala Jew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: We use this DVD player in our car for the kiddos. It hangs perfectly on the back of you head rest. The sound & picture are very clear & it's easy for the kids to use. It also comes with a case for the DVD player. Completely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gray

customer_reviews.title: this DVD player has been awesome for long trips with the kids
customer_reviews.text: this DVD player has been awesome for long trips with the kids.!!! Works great! Loved that it can be charged up or can plug into car. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M. Stumpe

customer_reviews.title: It does good only thing is it's loud
customer_reviews.text: It does good only thing is it's loud .....like not the movie's volume....the fan/ disk player or whatever it is. And the battier doesn't really last long. Like I can't get it to make it through a entire movie thats like 101 mins
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Sami

customer_reviews.title: Sound is way too low
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good. Looks and operates easily but the sound is way too low. You have to wear headphones to hear it and that's at the highest level. No there is no problem with my hearing.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: My Third (Synagy) DVD Player And All Of Them Still Work
customer_reviews.text: I just got this Synagy player because I wanted another larger screen. Except for a slightly darker picture on screen, this player still works as well as my other two.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyRayne

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it for my great granddaughter my grandson and his wife love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my great granddaughter my grandson and his wife love it, riding in the car and going to dinner
customer_reviews.author: Anne Decker

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very pleased with out DVD player. It is a perfect compact size and has a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great little player
customer_reviews.text: Works great,every thing is very easy to understand . Picture is very clear, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: REO

customer_reviews.title: I think she will love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it to my Daughter as a gift. I think she will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Healy

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, good screen color
customer_reviews.text: Will use for travel, esp air; for religiious dvds from CBN; wish it had a carrying handle which could also hang on the plane otherwise, very nice and easy to use - like the dvd cover -- directions a little sparse - im not too tech savy (77) so could have used more directions -- and color coded tabs on face --but that might clutter the nice appearance. Thanks for the carry bag forthcoming!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Travel DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these as Christmas Gifts. We have used them a few times now and I like them. They charge pretty quickly and hold a charge quite a long time. We've been through almost 2 movies without having to plug them in. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because they don't come with a case or way to attach to the seat back so my kiddos had to hold them... it would be a nice addition if the company would consider it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: So far works great and held up to kid
customer_reviews.text: Used for a couple vacations. So far works great and held up to kid use
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: DVD CD player review
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying using my unit, although had problems with USB usage, didn't show all of my pictures and the tracks did not change the pictures, showed the same picture over and over. I only use DVD and the CD until I can figure the problem with the USB part, other than that I am enjoying the unit.
customer_reviews.author: RADROSE

product_meta.title: SYNAGY 12'' Portable DVD Player with 10.1" HD Swivel Screen, Car Mount Holder, Remote Control, with Built-in Rechargeable Battery,Car Charger and Power Adaptor Support CD/DVD/VCD/SD Card/USB(Black)
feature_bullets: Fantastic 270 Degree Swivel Screen - SYNAGY portable video players provide (1)180 degree rotation to left (2)90 degree rotation to right (3)180 degree vertical flip-over to a tablet style, making your hands free & feel more convenient at a watching angle.We have a promotion that get a 10.1"-10.5" SYNAGY Car Headrest Mount Holder for free when you purchase 1 or more SYNAGY 10.1" Portable DVD Player. Please add both to cart and enter code 2OVIW58N at checkout.

Support Multiple Media Format - SYNAGY personal video players can play CD, DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, VCD, S-VCD, MPEG2, AVI, WMA, JPEG. Also, it can also play MP3,MPEG2,JPEG,WMA,DIVX, AVI with USB and SD cards.

Premium Design for Multi-Application - SYNAGY portable DVD players are great for seniors, adults, teens, children, toddlers to enjoy video; great for kids to study; built-in anti-shock function, great for using when driving

Built with Last Memory Function - SYNAGY portable DVD players support to play at the place where you stop last time by the break-point memory function (Note: the default setting is OFF. Please click the remote control or panel button: SETUP-LAST MEMORY-ON to start the function.)

Provides with 3 Power Systems - SYNAGY personal DVD players provide AC power adapter, car charger & rechargeable lithium battery, making you use more convenient at more places.Note: after a full charge, the portable dvd player can play about 4 hours.
